editTermsHint: Edit the terms and conditions for this proposal
defaultTerms:
1. Payment terms: 30% deposit, 40% upon completion of structural work, 30% upon final delivery.
2. Project timeline is estimated and may vary based on weather conditions and material availability.
3. Any changes to the project scope will be billed at actual cost plus 20% administration fee.
4. Warranty: 1 year on workmanship, materials as per manufacturer's warranty.
5. Client is responsible for obtaining all necessary permits and approvals.
defaultExecutiveSummary: This is a cost estimate proposal for the {{projectName}} project.
clientProposalIntro: Dear {{clientName}}, we are pleased to present this proposal for the {{projectName}} project by {{companyName}}.
clientProposalScope: This proposal outlines the scope of work and estimated costs for your project.
clientProposalClosing: We look forward to working with you on this project.
